00055 
00056 void BasicEnumerated::completeParsing(rapidxml::xml_node<> const &node) {
00057   rapidxml::xml_node<> *iter = node.first_node("elem");
00058   
00059   for( ;NULL!=iter; iter=iter->next_sibling("elem") ) {
00060     rapidxml::xml_attribute<> *val = iter->first_attribute("value");
00061     
00062     if( NULL!=val ) {
00063       std::string txt(val->value(), val->value_size());
00064 
00065       addTextValue(txt);
00066     }
00067   }
00068 }
00069 
00070 
00071 // observers :
00072 
00073 std::string BasicEnumerated::getStringValue(size_t i) const {
00074   std::ostringstream oss;
00075   print_value(oss, i);
00076   return oss.str();
00077 }
00078 
00079 std::ostream &BasicEnumerated::print_domain(std::ostream &out) const {
00080   size_t i, size = getSize();
00081   if( 1==size ) 
00082     return print_value(out, 0);
00083   else {
00084     print_value(out<<'{', 0);
00085     for( i=1; i<size; ++i ) 
00086       print_value(out<<", ", i);
00087     return out<<'}';
00088   }
00089 }
00090 
00091 std::ostream &BasicEnumerated::toXml(std::ostream &out, size_t tabs) const {
00092   std::ostream_iterator<char> pad(out);
00093   std::fill_n(pad, tabs, ' '); 
00094   size_t i, size = getSize();
00095   out<<'<'<<getTypeName();
00096   if( 0==size )
00097     return out<<"/>";
00098   else {
00099     out<<">\n";
00100     for( i=0 ; i<size; ++i ) {
00101       std::string strVal=getStringValue(i);
00102       
00103       std::fill_n(pad, tabs+1, ' '); 
00104       out<<"<elem value=\"";
00105       if( !strVal.empty() )
00106        // I know I use undocumented method but that's the easiest way to encode
00107        // special chars in a correct XML format
00108        rapidxml::internal::copy_and_expand_chars(strVal.c_str(), 
00109                                             strVal.c_str()+strVal.length(),
00110                                             '\0', 
00111                                             std::ostream_iterator<char>(out));
00112       out<<"\"/>\n";
00113     }
00114     std::fill_n(pad, tabs, ' '); 
00115     return out<<"</"<<getTypeName()<<'>';
00116   }
00117 }

00119 // manipulators
00120 
00121 void BasicEnumerated::accept(DomainVisitor &visitor) const {
00122   return visitor.visit(this);
00123 }
